programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Daring Sung Dynasty must fight their way out of trap after trap and band together to save the prime minister.

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Li Han Hsiang brings us this delightful adventure, which revolves around Emperor Chien Lung's incognito journey through China.

programme.title: The Golden Knight
programme.desc: Veteran Yueh Feng made this 'Martial Arts World' saga of a masked master of the 'Black Sand Hand Technique,' starring Lily Ho in a dual role.

programme.title: Twelve Deadly Coins
programme.desc: Flipping a coin' takes on a whole new meaning in this action-packed, martial arts melodrama - because the pocket change is actually deadly kung-fu weapons.

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting Pei plays a girl hiding from her father while working as a club singer in Japan. Then her father sends someone for her only for the man to fall in love with her.

programme.title: The 14 Amazons
programme.desc: This award-winning film starts when Yang Tsung-pao is killed while fighting invaders from West Hsia - and the Yang clan forms their own army in retaliation.

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The film's curious title refers to two props that signal a happy beginning to what develops into a tragic love story, linking a scholar and a local beauty.

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: In this 'Flying Guillotine' follow-up, a fearless woman (Chen Ping) takes on a flying guillotine gang even while she's pregnant!

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: Three women and three men beguile, blackmail, bicker and backstab each other all the way to a shocking surprise ending.

programme.title: The Convict Killer
programme.desc: Director Chor Yuan teams with star Ti Lung and famed novelist Chu Yu in the creation of this intriguing kung fu saga.

programme.title: When the Clouds Roll by
programme.desc: A doctor falls for a schizophrenic old classmate he's treating who refuses to accept that her lover is dead.

programme.title: The Flying Dagger
programme.desc: The Flying Dagger is an exceptional collaboration between Chang Cheh and swordswoman supreme, Cheng Pei-pei of 'Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon.'

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: A cruel uncle stands in the way between a young scholar and the beautiful gal with whom he falls in love, and happiness.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: A kind Emperor lands himself in big trouble when he begins frequenting the gambling dens to learn what makes his subjects tick. Stars Anthony Lau, Wong Yue.

programme.title: Big Times for the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: When a bag of jewels falls from the sky, that's just the start of Ah Niu's misadventures involving a brothel, a disastrous wedding night and the cops!

programme.title: The White Storm 2 - Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau & Louis Koo, a bounty of USD $100 million awaits those who successfully capture the biggest drug dealer in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Hello Mr. Billionaire
programme.desc: Duo Yu, a goalkeeper for a hopeless football team, is made an offer by his rich uncle - to be made heir to his vast fortune, but only if he can spend one billion yuan (US$144 million) in a month.

programme.title: This is Not What I Expected
programme.desc: Starring Takeshi Kaneshiro & Zhou Dong, this drama depicts how food connects an obsessive CEO & a ragged chef. What comes of their clash?

programme.title: The Golden Job
programme.desc: Former mercenaries reunite for a noble heist only to realize that one of them is double-crossing them. Filmed across Europe & Asia and stars Ekin Cheng, Jordan Chan, Michael Tse, Jerry Lamb & Chin Ka Lok.

programme.title: League of Gods
programme.desc: Jet Li, Tony Leung, Fan Bing Bing, Louis Koo, Huang Xiaoming, Angelababy & other big stars in this epic action-fantasy based on the novel, Fengshen Yanyi

programme.title: Weeds on Fire
programme.desc: This award-winning film reveals the true story of Hong Kong's first youth baseball team, who miraculously defeats a powerful rival to become champions

programme.title: True Legend
programme.desc: Su Can, the Qing Dynasty's top general, returns to his hometown - but when his wife is killed & his family falls victim to a conspiracy, his salvation may lie in the Drunken Fist.

programme.title: Love on a Diet
programme.desc: After breaking up with her boyfriend, Mini binges and balloons to 260 pounds - but hope to resurfaces when she meets Fat Lo .

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: Director John Woo gathers Chinese, Japanese & Korean superstars - Zhang Han Yu, Masaharu Fukuyama & Ha Ji Won - in this remake of the classic crime thriller.

programme.title: Rhapsody of Kidnapping
programme.desc: When three tech founders lose their new inventions to a sleazy tycoon, they kidnap the man's wife, mistress, love child - and her grandma. However, the tycoon has another nasty trick up his sleeve.

programme.title: The Mobfathers
programme.desc: Chapman To, Anthony Wong & Gregory Wong helm this underworld saga about a terminally-ill gang leader, whose two lieutenants are fighting over his post.

programme.desc: Recipient of a 2015 Film of Merit award, this drama stars Miriam Yeung as a middle-aged woman who attends a high school reunion, and finds her youth waiting.

programme.desc: Noticing the closeness between Raghbir and Pragati, Kunti threatens Pragati to leave him forever. However, Pragati refuses to succumb to her demand due to Kunti creates drama in the house by accusing her.

programme.title: Ejen Ali
programme.desc: Ejen Bakar telah dituduh pengkhianat. Ejen Ali yakin pakciknya tak bersalah dan tekad untuk menyiasat dan mencari bahan bukti. Ejen Ali dibantu kucingnya, Comot.

programme.title: Abang Sado Boleh Beres
programme.desc: Tina datang bersama-sama Aiman, anak saudaranya. Tina menyatakan bahawa dia sukakan Razif. Masa yang sama, Adibah Yunus, seorang pelakon hadir mendaftar di gim itu. Rahul melayan pelakon itu dengan baik.

programme.title: Checklist Mr Right
programme.desc: Nina mengambil keputusan untuk kembali aktif membuat sesi ulasan di media sosial. Niesa mencadangkan agar Nina berkunjung ke lokasi menarik di sekitar bandaraya JB. Adam diminta untuk temankan Nina.

programme.title: Shah Alam 40000
programme.desc: 3 wanita bersahabat baik hidup di kejiranan golongan atasan selalu melepak bersama tapi menyimpan rahsia tersendiri, sehinggalah masing-masing mendedahkan rahsia dan berlakunya insiden yang tidak diingini.

programme.title: Buletin Utama
programme.desc: Berita tempatan dan antarabangsa yang terkini.

programme.title: Anak Sena
programme.desc: Kisah pengorbanan seorang guru dalam membimbing anak masyarakat Orang Asli. Wadi seorang pelajar anak Orang Asli yang mempunyai bakat dalam sukan. Cikgu Amir cuba mencungkil bakat dimiliki pelajar itu.

programme.title: Terlerai Noktah
programme.desc: Rania yang datang ke rumah Zaira, membantu Zaira menjaga Aiman, namun Rania terkejut bila melihat parut Aiman. 20 tahun lalu, Razak menjual Hani dan Zaira pada Tuan Ismail di pulau Randai.

programme.title: Flower of Devil
programme.desc: A police officer hands over a watch strap as a piece of evidence from the crime scene in Gakyeongri to Ji Won. It is the strap that is engraved with Hee Seong's initials on it.

programme.title: Suami Sebelah Rumah
programme.desc: Eryna and Amar hidup berjiran sejak kecil and pelajar tahun akhir di Universiti. Di kampung, Mak Non, ibu Eryna selalu bertanya khabar kerana dia menyukai Amar yang baik budi pekerti and menghormati orang tua.

programme.title: Pink Smile
programme.desc: Irsyad and isterinya Amina mempunyai dua orang anak perempuan bernama Myra and Luna. Luna, gadis ceria yang masih belajar sangat menyukai Areeq, seorang pengusaha kafe, iaitu Duncan CoffeeHouse.

programme.title: 7 Hari Mencintaiku
programme.desc: Sejak dari sekolah menengah lagi Mia menunjukkan sikap sombongnya pada kawan-kawannya iaitu Khuzairi disebabkan dia anak kepada Pegawai Daerah, ayahnya ditukarkan di kampung tersebut.

programme.title: Senario

programme.title: KOOL FM @ TV9

programme.title: Dhia Sofea
programme.desc: Dhia pulang ke kampung halamannya setelah tamat kolej. Ibunya Mak Yam, mendedahkan rahsia yang dipendamnya selama 23 tahun. Dhia tersentak apabila diberitahu dia hanyalah anak angkat.

programme.title: Jejak Rasul
